name: Dimensional Phaser Beta
description:
Photosensitive people !!!SEIZURE WARNING!!!

Try your best not to crash because you can get epilepsy.

 If you flip upside down or drive off the map  just restart the game from the pause menu.

W - Forwards

A - Left

S - Backwards/Brake

D - Right

R -  Restart Level

Esc - Pause

After you finish playing please take some time to answer the form : 

https://forms.gle/GCTo4ZLyAk5VZM498
